resources.string: This appears to be your first run. You should check your settings.
This feature requires GPS location services.

SpecimenRecorder â€” Record Specimen In The Field Easily 
****************************************************** 
 
This app is still under development and not really safe 
for productive usage. The following parts of the app do NOT 
work yet: 
 
* Store a default location 
* Create specimen records with a non-timestamp date/time 
* Editspecimens/locations 
* Export specimens/locations 
* Delete specimen/location records 
* Clean up the used disk space 
 
The following parts do work: 
 
* Create specimen records 
* Create location records 
* Link specimen to location 
* Use the current GPS position for specimen and location records 
* Add Images to the records 
 
All data is stored on the external storage space (usually ``/sdcard``) 
and can be accessed by third party tools. 
 
Data 
==== 
 
All records is stored in JSON files. These files will be split if their 
size increases over 8000 Bytes. The images are stored as JPEG.
